Lefty Leifield - Good condition with creasing (Polar Bear back) - Nice pencil signature, 1 of only 2 I know of. eBay

Larry Doyle (Throwing) - VG condition with a crease (Sweet Caporal back) - Great clear pen signature. eBay

Larry Doyle (Portrait) - Fair/Poor condition (Piedmont back) - Nice clear pen signature. SOLD

Rube Marquard - VG front with back damage (Sweet Caporal back) - Lighter blue pen signature (darker than scans shows). eBay

George McBride - Fair/Poor condition (Piedmont back) - Nice pen signature. eBay
